Generated Narrative: ConceptMap ConceptMap-R5-Annotation-elements-for-R4-Annotation

Mapping from (not specified) to (not specified)


Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Annotation|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

Source CodeRelationshipTarget CodeComment
Annotation:(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Annotation#AnnotationFHIR R5 ComplexType `Annotation` is representable via FHIR R4B extensions. Element `Annotation` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Annotation`.
Annotation.author[x] (author[x]):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Annotation#Annotation.author[x]Note that the target element context `Annotation.author[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Annotation`. Element `Annotation.author[x]` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Annotation.author[x]`. Note that the target element context `Annotation.author[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Annotation`.
Annotation.time (time):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Annotation#Annotation.timeElement `Annotation.time` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Annotation.time`.
Annotation.text (text):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Annotation#Annotation.textElement `Annotation.text` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Annotation.text`.

name: ConceptMapR5AnnotationElementsForR4Annotation
title: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4
description: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.

target.comment:
FHIR R5 ComplexType `Annotation` is representable via FHIR R4B extensions.
Element `Annotation` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Annotation`.

Note that the target element context `Annotation.author[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Annotation`.
Element `Annotation.author[x]` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Annotation.author[x]`.
Note that the target element context `Annotation.author[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Annotation`.
Element `Annotation.time` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Annotation.time`.
Element `Annotation.text` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Annotation.text`.
